properties.name: Amazon Rainforest
properties.description: Posted by CoreyisaballerAmazonasThe Amazon Rainforest also known as, Amazonia or the Amazon Basin, is a rich growing fertile forest covering 1.2 billion acres of land. This great rainforest is located in 6 different countries, with it mostly in the Country of Brazil. This rainforest is home to some of the coolest animals and plants around. The Amazon Rainforest represents more than half of the worlds total tropical rainforests! The people that live here are mostly tribes of the local Brazilians.

properties.name: Colosseum
properties.description: Posted by Coreyisaballerrome, italythe colosseum was built 70-80 A.D. It originally was built for fighting or gladiatorial fights. sometimes, the gladiators would fight animals, or themselves. When it was built for 50,000 people. Nowadays, people visit this great historical monument. Thousands of people visit this place every year.

properties.name: Eiffel Tower
properties.description: Posted by CoreyisaballerParis, Francethe Eiffel tower is located in Paris, France. It is the largest building in Paris. this magnificent structure was built in 1889, and at that time, it was the largest building in the world. the Eiffel tower stands 320 meters high, and weighs 7000 tons. the Eiffel tower was named after its designer Gustave Eiffel. It was built for the World\'s Fair to demonstrate that iron could be as strong as stone while being infinitely lighter. the Eiffel tower is a great monument for the world to see. it is also a great historical place.

properties.name: Gibson Desert
properties.description: Posted by Coreyisaballerwestern Australiathe Gibson Desert covers about 155,000 square kilometers in western Australia. there are many deserts lying in Australia, But this one is the largest. there are many shrubs and different grasses lying here. There aren\'t many people living here because it never rains, and stays very hot.

properties.name: London, England
properties.description: Posted by CoreyisaballerLondon, EnglandLondon,is the largest urban area and capital of England. it has many old facts about war-time there and other things. This place is also home to the royal castle. It is also famous for its big ben clock tower. London has 7.5 million people living there. did you know that over 300 different languages are spoken there? This london is a great historical city.

properties.name: Mt. Everest
properties.description: Posted by CoreyisaballerNepalMt. Everest is located between Nepal and China. This is the Tallest mountain peak in the world. It was formed over 60 million years ago. it is 29,035 feet tall. It is named after a british surveyor who found it in 1865. This Mountain has been an obstacle for many to climb. It was done first in May 29,1953. since then hundreds have made it up to the peak. This is a great geographical mountain.

properties.name: Mt. Mckinley
properties.description: Posted by CoreyisaballeralaskaMt. McKinley is the largest mountain peak in North America. It stands 20,320 feet tall. It lies in Denali National park in Alaska. Temperatures on Mt. McKinley can get deadly cold. It once was recorded that it was -100 degrees Fahrenheit. this mountain is a great place for people to see just how beautiful the world can be. This is a great geographical place.

properties.name: The Great Wall Of China
properties.description: Posted by CoreyisaballerChinaThe Great Wall of China, stretches from eastern China to western China. it stretches 4,163 miles. it also has over 2000 years of history. The Wall was first built as protection, but now it is a great attraction for millions of people to see. some people say a tour of the Wall is like a travel through history. this wall is a great historical monument.

properties.name: Washington D.C
properties.description: Posted by CoreyisaballerWashington D.C is the capital of our country. It has been the capital since the late 18th century. the white house is where the president lives. The white house was burned down in 1814 during the War of 1812. Then the White HOuse was re-built. We also have the capital building where congress is. This large city is a very neat historical city because you can just visit it and be in awe.

properties.name: sahara desert
properties.description: Posted by CoreyisaballerafricaThe Sahara Desert, is located in central Africa. It is one of the driest places on earth. Mostly covered by sand and sand dunes, the desert only gets around 3 inches of rain every year. This enormous desert has various plant life. Ranging from grasses, to shrubs, to trees including cactus\'s. This desert has many important qualities that of a geographical place.
